body.name: Victoria's Secret PINK Seamless Hipster Panty Pack, Women's Underwear (XS-XXL)
features: The Takeaway: These seamless panties are hip hugging and oh so cute.
A hipster cut and comfy seamless design make this women's underwear pack a must-have.
The hipster cut features moderate coverage that shows a little but not all. These low rise panties pair perfectly with your favorite low rise bottoms.
Cut from soft, stretchy fabric that moves with you.
Our Victoria's Secret PINK panty collection comes in a variety of prints and colors to find a style that you love.
body.description: Victoria's Secret is a renowned lingerie and fashion brand celebrated for our sensuous designs, premium fabrics, and self-assured ethos. Offering a diverse selection of intimate wear, loungewear, and fragrances, VS empowers women to embrace their confidence and allure. lingerie womens underwear underwear women pack victoria secret panties seamless underwear for women underwear victoria secret panties women's underwear underwear women women underwear pack calzones para mujer womens underwear seamless ladies underwear panties women underwear women panties black underwear women womens seamless underwear seamless underwear woman underwear panty hipster panties for women pink victoria secret seamless underwear women victoria secret underwear breathable underwear for women women's underwear pack women underwear seamless ladies underwear blumer de mujer paquete en oferta ladies panties underwear women pack seamless hipster underwear for women seamless panties seamless panties for women womens hipster underwear women's underwear seamless underwear women seamless women's hipster panties underwear seamless seamless underwear for girls girls seamless underwear womens panties seamless women seamless underwear seamless hipster underwear women womens underwear hipster hipster panties hip hugger panties victoria secret hiphugger panties hiphugger panties for women

productInformation.value: #44,514 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry (See Top 100 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry) #74 in Women's Hipster Panties

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Soft and comfortable
reviews.reviewText: +PINK sizing, true to size+Stretch, soft and comfortable. Fits very well, doesn’t ride up or bunch+Colors and material hold up to wash

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 14, 2024
reviews.reviewText: These panties are so soft and snug. They’re gorgeous material and I love the way they feel on my skin. It almost feels like wearing nothing..it’s not itchy, doesn’t shrink, feels light, looks aesthetic. I didn’t expect any less from this brand of underwear.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Soft, No Panty Line
reviews.reviewText: These panties are very soft, it feels like you have nothing on. They are very thin so there is no visible panty line and are comfortable to wear.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Remember Pink Brand is for junior sizes. Legit V.S. quality.
reviews.reviewText: These are legit Victoria's Secret quality as far as we could tell. Well made and packaged in this set of five colors, they are a good deal, which you can only beat when you get the free coupon in the mail for a free pair.Remember when ordering that the Pink brand is for juriors sizing, so Medium is not the same as a women's Medium.My wife washed them and they came out as expected.BOTTOM LINE: Good value and quality from a known brand. Hope this helps.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I am absolutely loving these panties. They are super soft and I barely notice they are there. They are thin and don't show a panty line. The colors are cute too! Perfect for everyday wear.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best panty I've worn in a long time
reviews.reviewText: These are so soft and comfortable. I'm a 2X and these panties are not binding at all, in fact they fit so perfectly that there is no wedgie or anything. It's nice to have a panty that stays put and still has no lines. The colors look just as they are shown. I think I have found my new favorite panty.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I've had Victorua Secret underwear for a long time and this set doesn't disappoint. It's soft, stretchy, and comfortable. I like to wear this type of underwear to bed and it feels great. True to size and fits me as expected. I'm happy I got this product!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this Underwear
reviews.reviewText: These are the best panties I have worn in a long time. They are super soft and don't ride up or fall down. They appear true to size, but they do have a little stretch. If I were on the lower end of a size I might consider ordering down a size to try. The colors are represented accurately and they wash up well. Definitely happy with this product!!
